dmca.title: Copyright Infringement Notification
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

 

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

 

 

________________________________

From: DB Design [mailto:daniel.boorn@gmail.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, May 15, 2007 12:40 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: Copyright Infringement Notification

 

Dear Planet Support Team, 

This email is to notify you that one of your customers is illegally
reselling copyrighted software that is solely owned and sold my me.
Below you will find permission to act on my behalf to investigate this
claim and information on what exactly is being illegally sold and how
your customer obtained a copy of it. 

Customer Information
-------------------------------------------
Domain: http://www.ypninc.com
Name: Sam T. 
Emails on File: support@ypninc.com <mailto:support@ypninc.com> ,
samt@ypninc.com, store@pokerfinder.com
Business Names: YPN, INC, NetSolutions    

Product Being Illegally Sold (And Marketed on His Own)
------------------------------------------------------------------------
--------- 
PHP Real Estate Classifieds Script (http://phprealestatescript.com)
Developed and Sold By: Daniel Boorn (My Self)
Sold Only On: phpscriptindex.com (My Shopping Cart Page)
View Software License: http://phprealestatescript.com/terms.html

Product Listed Illegally Here:
http://www.ypninc.com/store/index.php?act=viewProd&productId=11
Product Illegally Installed Here: http://realestate.ypninc.com/index.php
Violated Sections of License Agreement: 2, 3, 4, 5, 11. He has illegally
installed the software on this domain and is marketing/selling the
software as his own! 


Background Information
------------------------------------------------------------------------
-------------
On Mar. 6 2007 customer purchased license for product from my shopping
cart web site using PayPal (transaction details below). The license
granted him access to install and run the software on one domain with no
resell or rights of ownership (
http://phprealestatescript.com/terms.html). On March 9th 2007 customer
request a refund for product in accordance to the refund policy listed
in the software license agreement (sections 10, 11).  A full refund was
processed on March 9th 2007, at that time customer had 10 days to
discontinue use of software in accordance to section 11 of the license
agreement. 

On May 4 2007 I was notified by another developer (Klemen Stirn) that my
software was being illegally sold on
(http://www.ypninc.com/store/index.php?act=viewProd&productId=11 ). On
May 4 2007 I send a notice to support@ypninc.com to immediately remove
that software. On May 4 2007 I received a reply back from
support@ypninc.com notifying me that he had purchased a license on
e-bay. I replied back notifying him that my product is not sold on e-bay
and that the license that he purchase is invalid (if it existed). I
checked e-bay for any software packages that may contain my product with
no results. I then ran a history check for his email address and
discovered the transactions noticed above. Meaning he obtained the
software via these transactions. 

I sent another email on May 7 2007 to support@ypninc.com notifying him
of the transactions and giving him 48 hours to remove the software from
his website. To this date nothing has been removed and no promise of
removal has been received. 

Purchase Transaction
------------------------------------------------------------------------
-------------
PayPal Trans ID: 1UJ06215MX461632W 
Customer's PayPal Email Address: support@ypninc.com

Refunded Transaction
------------------------------------------------------------------------
------------- 
Refund (ID #01E5619444753250L)
In reference to: 1UJ06215MX461632W
<https://www.paypal.com/us/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_history-details&info=g4J9
L8_cB7HuBF3nMGpOFlX5FMd4IL5-ExhnK1edErmFXFdmplpkKKYKnX4&history_cache=&s
earch_trans_id=> 
Customer's PayPal Email Address: support@ypninc.com

Request for removal of illegally posted/installed software and
copyrighted text. 
------------------------------------------------------------------------
----------------------------------------
This is a request for you to remove the the illegally installed software
here: http://realestate.ypninc.com/index.php
This is also a request for your to remove the copyrighted text posted
here: http://www.ypninc.com/store/index.php?act=viewProd&productId=11 


I thank you in advance for your urgent notice to this matter. Below is
my digital signature. 


Regards,

Daniel Boorn

daniel.boorn@gmail.com 
phpsales@gmail.com
phprealestatescript.com
therealestatescript.com
phpclassifiedsscript.com
phpscriptindex.com




-- 
**********************************************************************
Please Note: 3rd party modifications to software can't be warrantied. .
Please see software license agreement section 7 more more details. 
**********************************************************************
Disclaimer: The information contained in this message may be privileged
and confidential and protected from disclosure. If the reader of this
message is not the intended recipient you are hereby notified that any
dissemination, distribution or copying of this communication is strictly
prohibited. If you have received this communication in error, please
notify immediately by replying to the message and deleting it from your
computer. Thank you. 
**********************************************************************
